Comment.Language: The hymn "The Great High Priest (Megalou)" is chanted, followed by the "Our Lord (Apen[oic)." Note that if only the first verse in "The Great High Priest (Megalou)" is chanted, it is completed as follows: "Holy Mighty, Holy Immortal, have mercy upon us (a~gioc ic,uroc: a~gioc a~yanatoc e~le~/con /~mac)."

Text.Language: Megalou ar,ie~reuc ictouc e~w~nac a,ranton a~gioc o~ Yeoc:
The great High Priest, undefiled for ever. Holy God.
رئيس الكهنة الأعظم إلي الأبد الطاهر قدُّوس الله.
Kata t/n taxin tou Mel,icedek telioc a~gioc ic,uroc
According to the order of Melchizedek, perfect. Holy Mighty.
على طقس ملكي صادق الكامل قدُّوس القوي.
Ocarkwyenta ek Pneumatoc a~giou ke a~giac Mariac t/c paryenou mega to muct/rion a~gioc a~yanatoc e~le~/con /~mac.
You became incarnate of the Holy Spirit and of the holy Virgin Mary. Great is the mystery. Holy Immortal, have mercy upon us.
المتجسد من الروح القدس ومن العذراء مريم البتول بسِِرّ عظيم، قدُّوس الذي لا يموت ارحمنا.

Comment.Language: Then the following hymn is chanted:

Text.Language: A Pen[oic I/couc Pi,~rictoc: ern/cteuin e~h~r/i e~jwn: n~h~me n~e~hoou nem h~me n~e~jwrh: sa n~tefcotten qen nennobi.
Our Lord Jesus Christ, fasted for us forty days and forty nights to save us from our sins.
ربنا يسوع المسيح: صام عنا أربعين يوماً وأربعين ليلة حتى خلصنا من خطايانا.
Anon hwn maren ern/cteuin: qen outoubo nem oumeym/i: ouoh n~tenerp~roceu,ecye: enws e~bol enjw m~moc.
And we too let us fast, with purity and righteousness, and let us pray, proclaiming and saying:
ونحن أيضاً فلنصم بطهارة وبر . ونصلى صارخين قائلين:
Aiernobi aiernobi: pa[oic I/couc ,w n/i e~bol: je m~mon bwk n~aternobi: oude m~mon [oic n~at,w e~bol.
“I have sinned, I have sinned. My Lord Jesus, forgive me; for there is no servant without sin, nor master without forgiveness.”
أخطأت أخطأت ياربى يسوع المسيح اغفر لى لأنه ليس عبد بلا خطية ولا سيد بلا مغفرة.

Comment.Language: The following two verses may be chanted:

Text.Language: Ouc~yoinoufi pe Maria: ouc~yoinoufi etqen tecneji: ouc~yoinoufi esmici m~mof: saf,anennobi nan e~bol.
Incense is Mary, incense which is in her womb, the incense whom she bore, forgives us our sins.
البخور هو مريم، البخور الذى فى بطنها ، البخور الذى ولدته كى يغفر لنا خطايانا.
Marenhwc nem niaggeloc: enws e~bol enjw m~moc: je axia axia: axia Maria ]paryenoc.
Let us sing with the angels, crying out saying: worthy worthy worthy, Mary the Virgin.
فلنسبح مع الملائكة صارخين قائلين مستحقة مستحقة مستحقة يا مريم العذراء.
